answers.answer: 37 wks is tech ful term but 36 is fine n they wont consider tht premature its funny i just had this convo wit my doc today lol

Really and what did he tell you? According to my LMP & conceived date im 31 weeks but doc is going by my 1st ultrasound & according to that im 29+ but I don't think that's accurate idk if I should be worried because the longer my baby is in my tummy the higher risk he's in

I had to be induced at 35 weeks due to preeclampsia and my baby having iugr (inter uterine growth restriction). At that time my doctor told me that when babies are under stress they mature quicker such as their lungs. My little guy was 4lbs 12ozs and 18ins long. He did very well and had few problems which were jaundice and low blood sugar.  I wish I would had known to tell them to delay clamping because the blood from the placenta and umbilical cord have a lot to do with blood sugar hemoglobin. Anyhow he stayed in the hospital 4 days and got to come home.I pray that all goes well for y'all and that you both have a quick recovery.

Your baby will be fine as long as he comes out breathing good and don't need help then they will let him stay with you he might need to go to NICU for a day or so but there good my baby was born 2 weeks ago and I was 23+5 weeks she's in the nicu but she's doing good just needs to gain weight before coming home :)
Well theybtold me the longer they stay n the better my daughter was a preemie born at 34 wks ahe had to stay n the hospital for 10 days so i say if u can hold out try ur best
Most drs consider 37 wks full term. My middle baby was born @ 37 weeks. He had no problems at all. I pray all goes well. Good luck mama!

Thanx girls my doc told me he will be scheduling my appointments every two weeks to make placenta testto see for how long can my baby be held in there something like that I really didn't understand him at 34 weeks we'd be taking about my induction date.

I delivered my daughter at 35wks she was 5lbs 15oz so very healthy she was stubborn on feeds so therefore she was monitored. I will deliver at 37 wks this time around. Good luck your bundle will do great. :)

My sister had hera at 36&1/2 weeks and her.doctor considers her premature and she had to stay at the hospital for three days and then she can home but she wasn't in the nicu she just had jaundice so they wanted to keep her for an extra day

I had my first and second at 37wks. And my third at 35wks exactly. All of mine were completely healthy. Every child Is different. But I'm sure it will be fine. Your dr knows what's best for you and baby.

question: I have to get induce due to medical reasons & my doc is thinking of inducing me at 37 maybe even 36 weeks.  Is the baby considered premmie & is it safe for him?
title: Is 36 weeks concidered a primmie baby!!??
